meanings.definition: The action of following or monitoring something.
meanings.sent1: The tracking of the lost dog was successful.
meanings.sent2: The tracking system helped locate the package.
meanings.sent3: The detective's tracking of the suspect led to a surprising discovery.
meanings.sent4: Her tracking of the latest trends in fashion was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The satellite's tracking of the storm path saved many lives.

meanings.definition: The process of recording or monitoring the progress of something.
meanings.sent1: The tracking of sales figures is crucial for the business.
meanings.sent2: The project manager used tracking to monitor the team's tasks.
meanings.sent3: The tracking of cookie consumption at the party was unexpectedly fun.
meanings.sent4: The tracking of student performance revealed areas for improvement.
meanings.sent5: The tracking of migratory birds amazed the researchers.

meanings.definition: The act of pursuing or chasing something.
meanings.sent1: The tracking of the criminal through the forest was intense.
meanings.sent2: The lion's tracking of its prey was silent and swift.
meanings.sent3: The tracking of the ice cream truck by the kids was comical.
meanings.sent4: The tracking of the elusive butterfly proved challenging.
meanings.sent5: The tracking of the elusive butterfly proved challenging.
